text: 2.edineda jiwithaya ha sambandha prasthawa pirulu
dawge puhunu kirime kramawedaya widyanukula ekak wima ha upathin shri lankikayeku wima nisa shri lanka krikat palaka mandalaya daw pilibanda wa wadi unanduwak dakwuwa.
‛dan adhi aarakshitha kalapa na kiyala ne aanduwayi, hamudawayi kiyanne’..anith eka dan yuddhayath iwarayi…yalith ma pawasanawath samanga ohuge swaraya wenas wiya.

waradi niwaradi sewimadhathun wahansela handina ganimata eewaye yam kisi prathiharya dakwimak aththe da?buddha rathnaya, dhamma rathnaya, sangha rathnaya kerehi wishwasaya thabanna!dharmaya adharmaya thoraganimata daksha wennabudu nethin dutu heta dawase lokayadhammapadayaanathuren athmidennata namdhanaya ha santhrupthiyadewadharmadahama dutuwemu sarana labuwemuminisathbawe aruthamathale diwilla shri maliyadewa daham pasalaawabodha kalayuthu dharmaya meyayikawi sankalpanaparisaraya pilibanda bauddha aakalpayamrudu molok bawabhikshuniyak ananda himiyan wasangakara ganu sandaha hora leda ganiyi"sanwardhitha" pudgalaya handuna ganne keseda?dharma lekhanayabuduhimi desu pudgala shakthiya ha swadhinathwayauthurumagala nandasiri nahimi janma dina samarum pinkamabulumulle sumanarathana nahimi janma dina samarum ulelawarakawala sundararama wiharaye atawisi bodhi prakaraya wiwrutha kirime uthsawayamathale gammulle shri waggularama wiharayanawalapitiya kalugalhinna chiththawiwekarashramaya waligodawaththa shri sudarshanaramaya bulumulla sumanagiri darshanaramadhipathi udapalatha udabulathgama depalathe pradhana sanghanayaka pasbhage korale shasanarakshaka balamandalaye sabhapathi bulumulle sumanarathana nahimiyange pawidi jiwithayata wasara 50k pirima nimiththen ha malwathu wiharaye upadhyaya thanathura labima nimiththen pasugiyada nawalapitiya kalugalhinna weralugashinnedi uthsawa rasak pawathwini.

satan wiramayata muwawi kotiya shakthimath wanabawa rahasak nowiya.gotabhaya siyallatama pera yuddhaya kalahaki ayekuta hamudawa bharadunneya.awi aayudha walin hamudawa sannaddha keriya.lori kantenar pitin awi ayudha idiri aarakshaka walallata baweya.gini balaya saha maraniya parasaya wishala maltibaral gena aaweya.rajaye hamudawe chiththa dhairya nanwuyeya.ranilge eeniya sama giwisuma kunugodata wisikaramin idiri aarakshaka walalle bankar thaniya.kotiyata kade yana madhya karayanta, kappam gewana wyaparikayanta,koti samaga nidiwadina thanapathiwarunta rathu ira penwiya.kotiyata kahina suddanta pilithuru bande madamulana bhashaweni.

allas di janathawa mula karana sanskruthiya,gam mattame janathawa gonata andana ganwathura,niyan sahana sanskruthiyak janamadhya wisin aarambha kara atha.bolada janamadhya bhawithaya wenuwata madhya saksharathawen pamanak nowa siyalu aakaraye saksharathawangen janathawa sannaddha wiya yuthuyi.

in payakata pamana pasu thaththa ewanima bothalayak samanga pamina thama "deshapalana wiruddhawadinta" piduwe sathutini.

brithanya palakayan chithrapata waranaye di indiyawe sanskruthiya pilibanda athi wu kathikawa thama wasiyata pahasuwen harawa gaththe nidahas aragalaye mathawadayan da emagin thahanam kala hakiwa thibuna bawini.indiyanu nidahas satanata yantham ho balapanu athayi wishwasa kala chithrapata siyalla dewarak nosithama thahanam karana ladi.me dewasara athulatha kalkatawe ragum palaka mandalaya magin thahanam karana lada chithrapata sankhyawa 13 k wiya.thawath chithrapata 49 kma thira gatha karannata ida labune darshana rasakma iwath kala pasuwaya.me mathakaya samaga apa thawath wadagath indiyanu sinamawe purogamin kihipadenaku pilibanda mehi sadahan karamu.owun pasukalinawa indiyanu sinamawe hada thala sakas kirimata behewin dayaka wu bawini.direndranath gangopadhya hewath diren ganguli yanu hayidrabad hi nisam kala widuhale widuhalpathiwaraya wiya.nisam yanu hayidrabad pedese paramparika palakayage nila namayayi.ewakata eya palanaya kala nisam waraya wu enam mir osman ali khan siddik bahadur ewakata lokaye ma siti wadathma dhanawatha wiya.warthamana aandra pradeshaye aganuwara wu hayidrabad nagaraye jiwath wu nisam ema wanshaye awasana palakaya wiya.nidahas indiyawe di hayidrabad nagaraya andra pradeshaye aganuwara wu athara ethek pawathi rajakiya palanaya emagin awasan wiya.1937 pebarawari 22 tayim sangarawe kawaraye kathawa wenwune ohuge pohosath kama kiyannataya.ee wana wita eya amerikanu rajya wathkam walin siyayata ekak wiya.ohu sathu idakadam parimanaya warga kilo mitar 223000k hewath eksath rajadhaniye bim pramanayata samawiya.
